description: This source file defines an Android activity 'DetailsActivity' that hosts a content details fragment, manages intent creation with parcelable data, and handles activity lifecycle to display content details based on passed data.

classes.name: DetailsActivity
classes.description: An activity that displays content details by hosting a ContentDetailsFragment and creating intents with ContentItem data.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles the activity creation, initializes the UI container, and adds the ContentDetailsFragment with the content item.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: A static method that constructs an Intent to start DetailsActivity with a ContentItem as extra data.
